fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Detect! (Day): Guess a players role, if correct you will be privately informed and they will take a Basic attack at the end of the night. 3 uses.

fields.name: Informed! (Night):
fields.value: Select a player, learn their sub alignment. Resolves the moment the ability is performed, making it completely immune to non-permanent frames.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: May not Detect! a town or neutral benign role.
